channel.title: I feel like an idiot asking this
channel.description: where the hell do i change the lvls u can gain like mage att and str...im usin narbscape and the max lvl is 99...i want it at like 250.....

item.title: I feel like an idiot asking this
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

go to client.java…search for

return 99

you should see something similar to this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99; } *
Just Change the 99’s to 200, or whatever you want the max level to be this should work for narbscape
